Posts.Content: Jun 10, 2008 03:25PM waffle472 wrote: i've read up a bit more about this, and it looks like it could just be pms (or eczema, seeing as i have a history of it and it's like 90 out for the past few days) - i'm a bit sore and i'm expecting my period in a few days.  both the orange peel and the retractedness have gone away (i guess it was a morning thing??), and now the nipple is just red.  i'm not going to worry until after my period is over... if it continues to be an issue i'll go to the doctor. thanks for responding so quickly!  it was a relief.
